title: The 10 Best Game Awards Announcements - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.11.20
description:
Greg and Blessing run through their favorite moments from #TheGameAwards!

00:00:00 - Start
00:02:50 - Housekeeping
Andy is going to be streaming Cyberpunk 2077 showing off Ray Tracing and all that goodness on his Nvidia RTX 3080 Tuesday December 15th from  11-1 PT.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:08 - GAME AWARDS ANNOUNCEMENT RUNDOWN: Felicia Miranda @ IGN
00:48:45 -  Ad
00:52:48 - GAME AWARDS WINNERS
00:54:50 - Are the Game Awards inclusive enough? - Best Friends Q:Sucksandwich
01:04:20 - NPD for November 2020, Jeffy Grubb Grubb @ GamesBeat
01:06:55 - Out today
01:11:25 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
MON: Greg and Tim
TUES: Bless and Imran
WED: Greg and Gary
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Greg and Blessing
